title: Update: Her Boyfriend's Swinger Parents Wants To Swing With Her Parents!?
description:
Her boyfriend’s parents are in the lifestyle, and she is nervous that they are
going to bring it to her parents. How can she put a stop to it before it even starts?
She and her boyfriend have been together for a total of 6-months, and he recently told her a secret about his parent. They’re swingers.
A couple of weeks ago, her parents, without knowing the big secret, asked to meet her boyfriend’s parents.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
